column4: Hey guys.. I need to delete a file from within my hard drive through the Live CD because Ubuntu won't let me log in (disk too full). But I can't delete files on the drive from the Live CD because I don't have permission to. How do I get permissions set to do this?
- you can log in as root - clean the user space logout from root

when you log in you can enable yourself to log in as root - that will allow you to log in - then you can delete some files from the home of the user which does not allow you because of the full hard disk
